name: Sense your way
description:
In this game, you play an awakened character that uses its heightened sense to feel his way through a randomly generated maze.

  • Use ARROWS to move
  • Press SPACE to sense around you

This is my submission for Trijam #167. It was done in 3h37 instead of 3h, still overtime but a net improvement from last week. Two hours for the gameplay development and 1h30ish for art creation and polishing. I reused the dithering filter from a previous project to gain some time.

Music is to credit to @abstrkt. Huge thanks to him! Please consider checking what he does on his website.
